com.powerdata.openpa.tools.matrix

Interface FloatMatrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BDblPrime, BPrime, FloatArrayMatrix, MeasurementMatrix, SpSymFltMatrix

    public interface FloatMatrix
    Interface for a matrix with floating-point real values

    • Method Summary
